TestCase.TestCaseObjective: 1. The National C2IS system must provide categorisation of data to the MIP gateway. Users enter data into a set of predefined MIP-agreed categories (Topics).2. The MIP Solution shall not change the information context between Provider and Consumer. The MIP Gateway shall handle the exchange of information without human Intervention.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates objects in each of the following Topics:- Friendly Forces- Enemy Situation- CBRN- Engineer Support- Artillery / Fire SupportNote: These 5 topics have been selected as examples of predefined MIP-agreed, after the MSG-19 suggested initial set. But this is an issue still to be defined by PMG.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has pre-defined Topics: Friendly Forces, Enemy Situation, CBRN, Engineer Support, Artillery / Fire Support. Nation B is subscribed to all Topics of nation A.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is considered a success if both nations have the ability to enter, send and receive the data using the predefined MIP-agreed Topics (provided such a predefinition exists) and the information context (i.e. the Topic to which information is linked) does not change between Producer and Consumer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates Friendly / Neutral Organisations within the Friendly Forces Topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the objects on the Friendly Forces Topic.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates Hostile / Unknown Organisations within the Enemy Situation Topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the objects on the Enemy Situation Topic.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates Control Features within the CBRN Topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the objects on the CBRN Topic.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates Organisations, Persons and Equipment within the Engineer Support Topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the objects on the Engineer Support Topic.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates Organisations, Units, Persons, Control Features, Facilities, Equipment, Events and Tasks within the Artillery / Fire Support Topic.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the objects on the Artillery / Fire Support Topic.
